title: Another DDoS
body:
For the past two weeks or so my site is almost always under DDoS attack. So expect downtimes and always remember, that even when my site is down – I don’t stop making and uploading releases. You may find them on:

  • Kickass Torrents
  • Extra Torrents
  • RuTor

Tapochek.net and Free-Torrent.org require registration to view and download my torrents, but with 3 links above you’re covered 100%

This site is just a store front for stuff you can get in many other places 😉
